text: Tell me about a project where you faced a technical problem you couldn’t solve immediately.
Describe a time you had to learn a new technology or tool quickly.
Tell me about a time you worked in a team and there was a disagreement or conflict.
Describe a situation where your initial solution didn’t work. What did you do next?
Tell me about a time you had to manage multiple deadlines or tasks.
Describe a project where you took ownership of a feature or module.
Tell me about a time you received critical feedback. How did you respond?
Describe a situation where something went wrong close to a deadline.
Tell me about a time you helped someone else solve a problem.
Tell me about a project you are most proud of and why.
